FileSystemDirectoryHandleResolve.summary:
The resolve() method of the
interface returns an {{jsxref('Array')}} of
directory names from the parent handle to the specified child entry, with the name of
the child entry as the last array item.

remarks.para:
-File System API
-The File System Access API: simplifying access to local files

FileSystemDirectoryHandleResolve.returns:
A which resolves with an of
strings, or null if possibleDescendant is not a descendant of this .
